sentences.english: Be sad , and you lose them all .
sentences.chinese: 若悲傷感懷，你會與他們失之交臂。

sentences.english: "We always lose many chances we take in our lives.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是與生命中許多機會失之交臂。

sentences.english: Opportunity is rare, and wise man will never let it go by him.
sentences.chinese: 機會難得，聰明人從不失之交臂。

sentences.english: Sorry a lot of exhibitors due to slow by half a beat missed.
sentences.chinese: 惋惜不少展商由於慢半拍失之交臂。
